title: Full size washer and dryer, Smart package room, Dog spa
posting_body: Use the link below for more details:
ICONIC QUEEN ANNE LIVING AT ROY & MERCER
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 568-809 Sq.
Live next door to the Space Needle with direct connectivity to Seattle’s arts district at Center Steps.

In a vibrant new community establishing a gateway to Seattle Center from residential Uptown, you’ll find studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments with cutting-edge amenities and an unbeatably walkable Seattle location.
- Smart thermostats, select homes with Nest
- Two unique color palettes with movable kitchen islands*
- Through-block rain garden with sculpture displays by Miguel Edwards, Sarah Lavin, and Bocci
- 24/7 state of the art fitness center – with integrated cardio theater/TVs
- Two lounges – main floor and interior rooftop
- Outdoor courtyard with ping pong table
- Three unique rooftop decks that include fire pit, outdoor television, outdoor kitchens
- Game room with pool, darts and sonos record player
